nodes.text: The Risso hot springs moon was a moon known for its hot springs and thermal waters. The smuggler Damar Olin contemplated visiting a spa retreat on the moon after he finished the job he was doing with the smuggler Ana Tolla and her crew on Batuu. It shared its name with the Inner Rim planet Risso.
The Risso hot springs moon were first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
